key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to dependence on volatile raw materials like iron and steel
Regulatory and legal risks from evolving environmental and safety regulations
Economic sensitivity tied to municipal and utility infrastructure spending
Intense competition in the water infrastructure sector
Labor disputes highlighted by an open unfair labor practice case with the NLRB
controversies: Dismissed stock drop lawsuit related to alleged concealment of smart water meter defects
Open unfair labor practice case with the NLRB in Chattanooga, TN
social_issues: Labor disputes and potential operational disruptions
Commitment to promoting a culture of safety and environmental responsibility
governance_issues: Board refreshment with a focus on governance and sustainability
Recent insider stock sales potentially signaling management's confidence
